channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Nex Playground and Pixel Buds 2A top our list of the best deals this week
item.description: The Nex Playground is apparently one of the hottest consoles this holiday season thanks to its kid-friendly games and fun, motion-controlled gameplay. And now through December 14th, the cube-shaped console is on sale for its Black Friday low of around $199 ($50 off) at Amazon. There are some other great deals still available you might […]

item.title: Test de la Coros Pace 4 : une montre de sport légère et accessible, taillée pour la performance
item.description: Nouvelle montre entrée de gamme de Coros, la Pace 4 promet à la fois précision des données, format léger et écran Amoled lumineux. Voici son test complet.

item.title: TSA Sending Info on Domestic Travelers to ICE for Deportation Arrests
item.description: The program has been running since March but we're only learning about it now.

item.title: The best thing I bought this year: a portable mechanical keyboard
item.description: As a writer, I take the tools of my trade relatively seriously. I’m not crazy enough to drop $3,600 on a keyboard, but I also find typing on a MacBook for extended periods of time deeply unsatisfying — and distracting. So this spring, I started looking into distraction-free writing setups, which included an e-reader / […]

item.title: I switched from the iPhone 15 Pro to the iPhone 17 Pro, and I don't regret it – here's why
item.description: I upgraded my iPhone when I probably didn't need to – here are the main changes in two years of Apple development.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Sunday, December 14 (game #651)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Sunday, December 14 (game #1420)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Sunday, December 14 (game #917)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Reportage vidéo – Avatar 3 : comment ce film bouleverse la tech dans le cinéma
item.description: Avatar : De feu et de cendres débarque au cinéma ce mercredi 17 décembre 2025. Plus qu'un blockbuster, c'est un défi technologique et nous proposons d'en découvrir les coulisses en vidéo.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE ou Xiaomi 15T : lequel en promo à moins de 600 € mérite vraiment sa place sous le sapin ?
item.description: Pour les personnes qui cherchent un smartphone performant sans payer le prix fort, vous pouvez vous tourner vers le Samsung Galaxy S25 FE ou le Xiaomi 15T. Ce sont deux smartphones équilibrés dont le prix chute sous les 600 euros en ce moment, mais lequel choisir ?

item.title: 18 Gifts for People Who Are Perpetually Cold (2025)
item.description: From a backyard hot tub to the warmest slippers, these picks will make your loved ones feel warm and fuzzy—inside and out.

item.title: The Next Steven Spielberg Movie Has a Poster to Disclose
item.description: Time to get excited as Amblin prepares to finally reveal this new sci-fi movie from Steven Spielberg.

item.title: Sektori is psychedelic, tough as nails, and worth the pain
item.description: Sektori is an old-school twin-stick shooter. Created by a former developer at Returnal studio Housemarque, it puts you in the role of a little ship that blasts through swarms of enemies, and you have to weave through them to get upgrades to help you survive. Often, my runs end after less than a couple minutes, […]

item.title: Here are the shipping deadlines to get your holiday gifts on time
item.description: Let’s face it, the same thing happens year after year. Things get busy with work, school, and life in general until you’re suddenly up against the clock as you race your gifts to your local post office, FedEx store, or UPS location. We’ve all been there, but we’d like to help as you plan your […]
